Sentencas: The development of proton-conducting solid oxide electrolysis cells for the intermediate-temperature range application is largely hindered by the limited choice of adequate anode materials.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: In this study, the popular solid oxide fuel cell cathode material Pr2NiO4+ (PNO) is investigated as the anode for the electrolysis cell, considering its proton-conducting ability.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The introduction of protons into the PNO lattice is confirmed through insertion-induced conductivity variation measurements.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Good chemical compatibility is verified between PNO and BaZr0.2Ce0.6Y0.2O3- (BZCY) proton-conducting electrolyte.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Excellent catalytic activity towards water splitting is observed for the PNO-BZCY composite anode, 0.52 cm(2) for 550 degrees C, 0.057 cm(2) for 700 degrees C.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The water-splitting process is disclosed by impedance spectroscopy measured under different conditions.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Due to proton conduction in PNO, the PNO surface is activated for electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The non-charge transfer processes account little to the electrode resistance.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The performance of the PNO-BZCY anode is determined by two charge transfer processes whose kinetics are governed the electrolyzing potential.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: This charge transfer-limiting nature is relatively benign since the electrode resistance has been found to exponentially reduce with increasing overpotential.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Cathode-supported Ni-BZCY//BZCY//PNO-BZCY thin film electrolyte single cells are fabricated and characterized.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: approximate to 95% current efficiency is confirmed.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: At 700 degrees C, a current density of 977 mA cm(-2) is achieved at a 1.3 V electrolyzing potential, e.g. 0.37 V overpotential, which is one of the best performances of proton-conducting steam electrolysis cells so far.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The PNO-BZCY anode accounts only for 16% of the overall polarization resistance at 700 degrees C. These findings prove that the triple-conductive PNO is a promising anode material for proton-based steam electrolysis cells.
Titulo: High performing triple-conductive Pr2NiO4+ anode for proton-conducting steam solid oxide electrolysis cell
